targets.expr: sum (go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{region="${region}", job="buildbuddy-app", namespace="${namespace}"}) by (job, pod_name, namespace)

histogram_quantile(${quantile}, sum by (le, grpc_service, grpc_method) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{region="${region}", job="buildbuddy-app", grpc_service="raft.service.Api", namespace="${namespace}"})[$window]))
sum by (grpc_service, grpc_method, pod_name) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{job="buildbuddy-app", grpc_service="raft.service.Api", namespace="${namespace}"}[${window}]))

targets.expr: sum by (pod_name, raft_event, event_broadcast_source) (buildbuddy_raft_store_event_broadcast_dropped{region="${region}", namespace="${namespace}", job="buildbuddy-app"})
